privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: Vision Business Microfinance is committed to protecting the confidentiality of your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect the following information: name, address, email, phone, identification, financial information, credit history, and other data necessary for loan application assessment.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: Your data is used to: assess your credit eligibility, manage your account, contact you, comply with legal obligations, and improve our services.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement strict technical and organizational security measures including encryption, access control, and regular audits to protect your data.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your data as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. Loan data is retained for 10 years after contract termination.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access your data, rectify it, object to its processing, limit it, and request deletion within legal limits.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: By using our services, you accept these general terms and conditions.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: To benefit from our services, you must: be of legal age, reside in Ivory Coast, have valid identification, and provide required documents.

loanTerms.title: Loan Terms
loanTerms.content: Amounts, durations, and interest rates are determined based on your profile and communicated before any signature. Repayments must be made according to the agreed schedule.

latePayments.title: Late Payments
latePayments.content: Late payment penalties may apply for missed deadlines. Collection fees may be incurred in case of payment default.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access in case of terms violation or fraudulent behavior.

compliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
compliance.introduction: Vision Business Microfinance operates in compliance with Ivorian laws and regulations regarding microfinance.

regulatory.title: Regulatory Framework
regulatory.content: We are governed by law nÂ° 2013-690 of December 30, 2013 relating to microfinance institutions in Ivory Coast and supervised by the Central Bank of West African States (BCEAO).

consumerProtection.title: Consumer Protection
consumerProtection.content: We commit to respecting principles of transparency, fairness, and accountability in all our customer relationships.

complaints.title: Complaints
complaints.content: For any complaints, contact our customer service. For unresolved disputes, you may refer to the competent regulatory authority.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.introduction: Our website uses cookies to improve your user experience.

types.title: Cookie Types
types.content: We use essential cookies for functionality, analytics cookies to understand site usage, and preference cookies to remember your choices.

management.title: Cookie Management
management.content: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Disabling essential cookies may affect website functionality.
